name: Green Beans Braised with Shiitake Mushrooms
ingredients: 1/2 ounce dried shiitake mushrooms (about 10-11 small mushrooms)
1 teaspoon granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1 pound fresh green beans, ends trimmed

instructions.en: Soak dried shiitake mushrooms in 1 cup boiling water for 5 minutes, covered with plastic wrap
instructions.sk: Namočte sušené huby shiitake v 1 šálke vriacej vody na 5 minút, prikryté potravinovou fóliou
instructions.ja: 乾燥椎茸を1カップの熱湯に5分間浸し、ラップをかける

instructions.en: Remove mushrooms, cool slightly, remove tough stems and dice caps
instructions.sk: Vyberte huby, nechajte mierne vychladnúť, odstráňte tvrdé stonky a nakrájajte klobúčiky na kocky
instructions.ja: 椎茸を取り出し、少し冷まして硬い軸を取り除き、かさを細かく切る

instructions.en: Strain mushroom liquid through a paper towel lined strainer
instructions.sk: Preceďte hubovú tekutinu cez sitko vyložené papierovou utierkou
instructions.ja: ペーパータオルを敷いたザルで椎茸の戻し汁をこす

instructions.en: Add soy sauce and Splenda to strained mushroom liquid
instructions.sk: Pridajte sójovú omáčku a Splendu do precedenej hubovej tekutiny
instructions.ja: こした戻し汁に醤油とスプレンダを加える

instructions.en: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until almost smoking
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej vo veľkej panvici na stredne vysokom ohni, kým sa takmer nezačne dymiť
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで油を中高温で加熱し、煙が出そうになるまで熱する

instructions.en: Add grated ginger and cook for 20-30 seconds
instructions.sk: Pridajte nastrúhaný zázvor a varte 20-30 sekúnd
instructions.ja: おろした生姜を加えて20〜30秒炒める

instructions.en: Add green beans, diced mushrooms, and mushroom liquid mixture to the skillet
instructions.sk: Pridajte zelené fazuľky, nakrájané huby a hubovú tekutinu do panvice
instructions.ja: フライパンにインゲン豆、刻んだ椎茸、椎茸の戻し汁を加える

instructions.en: Cover and simmer on low heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally
instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte na miernom ohni 15-20 minút, občas premiešajte
instructions.ja: 蓋をして弱火で15〜20分煮込み、時々かき混ぜる

instructions.en: Increase heat to high briefly to evaporate remaining liquid
instructions.sk: Krátko zvýšte teplotu na vysokú, aby sa odparila zvyšná tekutina
instructions.ja: 火を強めて残った液体を蒸発させる

instructions.en: Season with salt and pepper to taste
instructions.sk: Dochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調える
